statements: UPDATE sensitive_data SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE sensitive_data SET username='new_username', password='new_password' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE sensitive_data SET email='new_email', encrypted_data=DECODE('74657374','hex') WHERE id=2;
UPDATE sensitive_information SET sensitive_data='Updated Sensitive Data' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE encryption_keys SET key_value='New Key Value' WHERE key_id=2;

UPDATE encryption_keys SET key_value='f12$%dkl9' WHERE key_name='MasterKey';

UPDATE users SET role='admin', password=ENC('new_password') WHERE user_id='4576e852-48cb-4d14-bafe-86db1b5d4267';
